documentation.description: Migrates the indices and ILM policies away from custom node attribute allocation routing to data tiers routing

dry_run.description: If set to true it will simulate the migration, providing a way to retrieve the ILM policies and indices that need to be migrated. The default is false

body.description: Optionally specify a legacy index template name to delete and optionally specify a node attribute name used for index shard routing (defaults to "data")
